FuncDef:
The service-class outbound enable command enables the service-class function of a QPPB local policy in the outbound direction.
The undo service-class outbound enable command disables the service-class function of a QPPB local policy in the outbound direction.
By default, the service-class function of a QPPB local policy in the outbound direction is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the service-class behavior is configured in a QPPB local policy, by default, the service-class behavior in the outbound direction is disabled. In a scenario, if there is a TM card in the board, traffic can be scheduled into the TM queue based on the qos-local-id. Run this command, this function in this scenario can be enabled.
Precautions
Only the eTM-equipped board supports downstream service-class actions in QPPB policies.
